summary: This file defines a Vue component named WorkExperienceItem, which is used to display individual work experience items in a structured format, including job title, company, employment type, duration, location, and description.
functionality: The component takes in a job object and an index as props, and it formats and displays the work experience details. It also processes the job description to convert it into a list format if it contains multiple points separated by double new lines or multiple spaces.
relationships: This component is likely used within a parent component that manages a list of work experiences, such as a WorkExperienceList component.
It relies on external SVG assets for icons and a shared SCSS file for styling, indicating a modular and reusable design approach.

identified_relationships.description: WorkExperienceItem is likely referenced by WorkExperienceList to display multiple work experience items.
WorkExperienceItem may import styles from styles.css to apply specific styling to the work experience items.
WorkExperienceItem may reference the Vuex store to access or modify work experience data.
WorkExperienceItem may reference the Vue Router to navigate to different routes related to work experience details.
